lead_paragraph: Guard Ben Hansbrough, who helped Mississippi State advance to the second round of the N.C.A.A. tournament, is transferring to Notre Dame. Hansbrough is the younger brother of Tyler Hansbrough.
snippet: Guard Ben Hansbrough, who helped Mississippi State advance to the second round of the N.C.A.A. tournament, is transferring to Notre Dame. Hansbrough is the younger brother of Tyler Hansbrough.
